mapper.insert: insert into person (name, age, job, phonenumber, bookmark) values (#{name}, #{age}, #{job}, #{phonenumber}, #{bookmark})
mapper.update: update person set age=#{age}, job=#{job}, phonenumber=#{phonenumber}, bookmark=#{bookmark} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select no, name, age, job, phonenumber, bookmark from person where no=#{no}
select no, name, age, job, phonenumber, bookmark from person
